text: Cigarettes that are acquired, held, owned, possessed, transported in, imported into, or sold or distributed in the District in violation of § 47-2419 shall be deemed contraband and shall be subject to seizure, forfeiture, and destruction by the Mayor under § 47-2409. The cigarettes shall be deemed contraband whether the violation of this chapter is knowing or otherwise.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 13-313 inserted the section symbol in the section heading.

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-225, see notes under § 47-2419.

For Law 13-313, see notes under § 47-2005.

DC CODE § 47-2423

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Seizure and forfeiture of gray market cigarettes.
